thread.title: High school soccer: Monument Mountain girls earn Western Mass. tournament berth
thread.title_full: High school soccer: Monument Mountain girls earn Western Mass. tournament berth

author:
Berkshire Eagle Staff
sports@berkshireeagle.com @EagleSportsZone on Twitter
title: High school soccer: Monument Mountain girls earn Western Mass. tournament berth
text:
4 
First Half SJ — Thien Nguyen (Mike Peplowski), 4:47. S — James Gonzalez (Jovan Wallace), 9:32. S — Gonzalez (Wallace) 15:12. SJ — Peplowski (unassisted), 16:53. SJ — Own Goal, 28:00. 
Second Half S — Premere Long (Chase Lamadelain), 42:05. SJ — Peplowski (UA), 55:40. 
WAHCONAH 4, TACONIC 1 
In Pittsfield, two quick second-half goals from Kyle Lyman led Wahconah over Taconic. 
Lyman's goal in the 60th minute broke a 1-1 tie. Six minutes later, Lyman converted a penalty kick, putting Wahconah up 3-1. 
Taconic tried push to the ball down field and a create shots on goal, but the Warriors used the Braves' aggressiveness against them. Wahconah stopped Taconic's push and started a quick counterattack, leading to a Chad Howes goal. 
Taconic falls to 5-7-2. 
"The penalty kick took the wind out of our sails," Taconic coach Mark Wasnewsky said. "It was a nice back-and-forth until the 60th minute." 
———
